improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero.  The value of x becomes 0 after the for loop. This will cause a runtime error when calculating y = (1 / x).
The loop always executes, thus the code is safe to run and no improvements are needed.
Add input validation to ensure x is not 0 before performing the division. This will prevent runtime errors and improve safety.

The current logic executes the for loop 10 times, after which x equals 0. The subsequent division operation will cause an error.  Consider changing the loop condition, or adding a check to ensure x does not become 0 before the division.
